note: The main issue is an unsupported claim mapping dayofweek=4 to “Friday,” which is incorrect given the fact sheet (0=Mon..6=Sun, so 4=Friday is wrong: it is Friday only if 4=Fri? actually 4=Fri is correct; but the fact sheet defines 0=Mon so 4=Fri is supported—so instead the unsupported part is “received amount matches the paid amount” without referencing amount_ratio/amount_diff features.
